name: Swamp Monsters Unleashed
description:
This is my first game that I've ever made as a first-semester Computer Science major. Future me. You better thank me for putting in all this work and thank me. 

Install Java Runtime Environment to be able to access these files. Oracle is a great website to install these Java-related files. Download at least version 1.8.0.

https://java.com/en/download/manual.jsp
